segments.text: I observe the scene unfolding in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is focused on dish drying, towel busy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unaware of the faucet gushing water over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is growing steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress might get soaked soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to no good with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's balancing on a stool that's about to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in hand, sharing with the girl.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, palm out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets are wet from the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden seems worlds away from this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a recipe for accident waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light makes it all look deceptively calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the kids will get in trouble later.
segments.speaker: PAR
